column1: gabriel damien tucker| how quietly you tipped into our world almost silently only for a moment you stayed but what an imprint your footprints have left upon our hearts. gabriel damien tucker arrived and left on june 18
column2: 2015. he is survived by his mother
column5: devin tucker; grandparents harold and diane tucker; an uncle
column12: and her husband brandon and their girls
column13: rileigh and paislee; and a host of other great aunts
column16: whom he would have loved. a graveside service will be held at 11 a. m. tuesday
column18: 2015 at holly memorial gardens. condolences may be sent to the family at www. hillandwood. com.
